TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract InlineShapes implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 一对象，代表文档、 范围或所选内容中的所有内嵌形状。

span.span: A collection of objects that represent all the inline shapes in a document, range, or selection.

remarks.span:
使用的InlineShapes属性， ，或对象返回集合。使用
方法，以创建新的图片作为内嵌形状。您可以使用和方法添加图片或 OLE 对象并将它们链接到源文件。使用方法，以添加 ActiveX 控件。
对象定位到文本范围，但可以自由浮动和可放置在页面上的任何位置。您可以使用方法和方法将形状转换为另一种类型。可以将图片、 OLE 对象和 ActiveX 控件转换为内嵌形状。
属性文档中此集合主篇文章中返回的项目数。若要计数的其他文章中的项目使用集合对象。
当打开在早期版本的 Microsoft Word 中创建文档时，图片将转换为内嵌形状。

span.para: Use the InlineShapes property of a , , or object to return an collection.
Use the method to create a new picture as an inline shape. You can use the and methods to add pictures or OLE objects and link them to a source file. Use the method to add an ActiveX control.

objects are anchored to a range of text but are free-floating and can be positioned anywhere on the page. You can use the method and the method to convert shapes from one type to the other. You can convert only pictures, OLE objects, and ActiveX controls to inline shapes.
The property for this collection in a document returns the number of items in the main story only. To count items in other stories use the collection with the object.
When you open a document created in an earlier version of Microsoft Word, pictures are converted to inline shapes.

span.span: This object, member, or enumeration is deprecated and is not intended to be used in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShape AddChart2 (int Style = -1, Microsoft.Office.Core.XlChartType Type = (Microsoft.Office.Core.XlChartType) -1, ref object Range, ref object NewLayout);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShape AddChart2([in]int32 Style, [in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Core.XlChartType Type, [in]object& Range, [in]object& NewLayout) runtime managed

Public Function AddChart2 (Optional Style As Integer = -1, Optional Type As XlChartType = (Microsoft.Office.Core.XlChartType) -1, Optional ByRef Range As Object, Optional ByRef NewLayout As Object) As InlineShape

param.name: Style
param.span: 图表样式。

span.span: The chart style.

param.name: Type
param.span: 图表类型。

span.span: The type of chart.

param.name: Range
param.span: 将文本中放置图表的区域。

span.span: The range where the chart will be placed in the text.

param.span: 图表将替换该范围，除非该区域折叠。

span.span: The chart replaces the range, unless the range is collapsed.

param.span: 如果省略此参数，则自动放置图表。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, the chart is placed automatically.

param.name: NewLayout
param.span: 如果是 true，则图表插入使用动态的新格式设置规则 （标题位于和图例才上是否有多个系列）。

span.span: If is true, the chart is inserted by using the new dynamic formatting rules (Title is on, and Legend is on only if there are multiple series).
Adds a chart to the document.

summary.span: 返回对象，它代表图表并将其添加到指定的集合。

span.span: Returns an object that represents the chart and adds it to the specified collection.

param.name: FileName
param.span: 必需的 字符串 。

span.span: Required String.

param.span: 要用于横线的图像的文件名。

span.span: The file name of the image you want to use for the horizontal line.

param.name: Range
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: Microsoft Word 在其上方放置横线的区域。

span.span: The range above which Microsoft Word places the horizontal line.

param.span: 如果省略该参数，则 Word 会将横线放置在当前选定内容的上方。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, Word places the horizontal line above the current selection.

summary.span: 向当前文档添加一条基于图像文件的横线。

span.span: Adds a horizontal line based on an image file to the current document.

span.para: 若要添加一条横线不基于现有图像文件，请使用方法。
To add a horizontal line that isn't based on an existing image file, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShape AddOLEControl (ref object ClassType, ref object Range);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShape AddOLEControl([in]object& ClassType, [in]object& Range) runtime managed
Public Function AddOLEControl (Optional ByRef ClassType As Object, Optional ByRef Range As Object) As InlineShape

param.name: ClassType
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 用于要创建的 ActiveX 控件的编程标识符。

span.span: The programmatic identifier for the ActiveX control to be created.

param.name: Range
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 一个区域，ActiveX 控件将放置在该区域的文本中。

span.span: The range where the ActiveX control will be placed in the text.

param.span: 如果该区域未折叠，则 ActiveX 控件将替换该区域。

span.span: The ActiveX control replaces the range, if the range isn't collapsed.

param.span: 如果省略该参数，则自动放置 ActiveX 控件。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, the Active X control is placed automatically.

summary.span: 创建一个 ActiveX 控件（以前称为 OLE 控件）。

span.span: Creates an ActiveX control (formerly known as an OLE control).

span.para: 此方法返回对象，表示新的 ActiveX 控件。
ActiveX 控件表示为对象或 Microsoft Word 中的InlineShape对象。若要修改 ActiveX 控件的属性，请使用属性指定的形状或内嵌形状对象。
This method returns the object that represents the new ActiveX control.

ActiveX controls are represented as either objects or InlineShape objects in Microsoft Word. To modify the properties for an ActiveX control, use the property of the object for the specified shape or inline shape.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShape AddOLEObject (ref object ClassType, ref object FileName, ref object LinkToFile, ref object DisplayAsIcon, ref object IconFileName, ref object IconIndex, ref object IconLabel, ref object Range);

Public Function AddOLEObject (Optional ByRef ClassType As Object, Optional ByRef FileName As Object, Optional ByRef LinkToFile As Object, Optional ByRef DisplayAsIcon As Object, Optional ByRef IconFileName As Object, Optional ByRef IconIndex As Object, Optional ByRef IconLabel As Object, Optional ByRef Range As Object) As InlineShape

param.name: ClassType
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 用于激活指定 OLE 对象的应用程序名称。

span.span: The name of the application used to activate the specified OLE object.

param.name: FileName
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 创建对象所用的文件。

span.span: The file from which the object is to be created.

param.span: 如果省略该参数，则使用当前的文件夹。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, the current folder is used.

param.span: 必须指定或对象，但不是能同时参数。

span.span: You must specify either the or argument for the object, but not both.

param.name: LinkToFile
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: True以链接到从中创建它; 文件的 OLE 对象False以便 OLE 对象的文件的独立副本。

span.span: True to link the OLE object to the file from which it was created; False to make the OLE object an independent copy of the file.

param.span: 如果您指定的值、参数必须为False。

span.span: If you specified a value for , the argument must be False.

param.span: 默认值为 False 。

span.span: The default value is False.

param.name: DisplayAsIcon
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 真 若要将 OLE 对象显示为图标。

span.span: True to display the OLE object as an icon.

param.span: 默认值为 False 。

span.span: The default value is False.

param.name: IconFileName
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 包含将要显示的图标的文件。

span.span: The file that contains the icon to be displayed.

param.name: IconIndex
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 内的图标索引号。

span.span: The index number of the icon within .

param.span: 图标显示在更改图标对话框 （插入菜单、 对象对话框） 顺序相对应的指定文件中的图标次序当选显示为图标复选框。

span.span: The order of icons in the specified file corresponds to the order in which the icons appear in the Change Icon dialog box (Insert menu, Object dialog box) when the Display as icon check box is selected.

param.span: 文件中第一个图标的索引号是 0（零）。

span.span: The first icon in the file has the index number 0 (zero).

param.span: 如果中不存在具有给定的索引号的图标，则使用具有索引编号 1 （在文件中的第二个图标） 图标。

span.span: If an icon with the given index number doesn't exist in , the icon with the index number 1 (the second icon in the file) is used.

param.span: 默认值为 0（零）。

span.span: The default value is 0 (zero).

param.name: IconLabel
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 显示在图标下面的标签（标题）。

span.span: A label (caption) to be displayed beneath the icon.

param.name: Range
param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 指定 OLE 对象放置在文本中的区域。

span.span: The range where the OLE object will be placed in the text.

param.span: 除非区域是折叠的，否则 OLE 对象将替换该区域。

span.span: The OLE object replaces the range, unless the range is collapsed.

param.span: 如果省略该参数，则自动放置对象。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, the object is placed automatically.
Creates an OLE object.

span.para: 返回对象，表示新的 OLE 对象。
Returns the object that represents the new OLE object.

param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 真 要将图片链接到创建它的文件。

span.span: True to link the picture to the file from which it was created.

param.span: False 使图片文件的独立副本。

span.span: False to make the picture an independent copy of the file.

span.span: The default value is False.

param.span: 可选的对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 如果为 True ，则将链接的图片与文档一起保存。

param.span: 可选的对象。

param.span: 图片置于文本中的位置。

span.span: If the range isn't collapsed, the picture replaces the range; otherwise, the picture is inserted.

param.span: 如果省略此参数，则自动放置图片。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, the picture is placed automatically.

span.para: 此方法返回对象，代表图片，并将其添加到集合。
This method returns a object that represents the picture and adds it to the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Creator { get; }
.property instance int32 Creator
Public ReadOnly Property Creator As Integer
public: property int Creator { int get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，它指示在其中创建指定的对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which the specified object was created.

remarks.span:
如果指定的对象在 Microsoft Word 中创建的此属性返回十六进制数字 4d535744，表示字符串"MSWD。"此值也可以由常量wdCreatorCode。主要设计
Creator属性用于 Macintosh，其中每个应用程序具有四个字符的创建者代码。例如，Microsoft Word 具有 MSWD 的创建者代码。有关此属性的其他信息，请咨询的语言参考 Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition 中包含的帮助。

span.para: If the specified object was created in Microsoft Word, this property returns the hexadecimal number 4D535744, which represents the string "MSWD." This value can also be represented by the constant wdCreatorCode.

The Creator property was primarily designed to be used on the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code. For example, Microsoft Word has the creator code MSWD. For additional information about this property, consult the language reference Help included with Microsoft Office Macintosh Edition.
